unnormalised: Organic farming, eh? My Nani in Kerala swore by it! No fancy Rs. 5000/kg veggies for her. Just good old desi cow dung and elbow grease. Remember "Lagaan"? Seems so much more sustainable than what I see coming out of Pantnagar University these days. Less chemical, more pyaar! Gotta get back to our roots, yaar! #organic #agriculture #India #kheti
normalised: Organic farming, eh? My Nani in Kerala swore by it! No fancy rupee five thousand divided by kilogram veggies for her. Just good old desi cow dung and elbow grease. Remember "Lagaan"? Seems so much more sustainable than what I see coming out of P A N T N A G A R University these days. Less chemical, more pyaar! Gotta get back to our roots, yaar! hash organic hash agriculture hash India hash kheti
